name: I NEED PAIN
description:
I NEED PAIN is a short, 10-level puzzle platformer where you must endlessly heal and harm yourself in order to progress. Made for the Black-and-White Jam #8, 2022, by myself. All assets are my own.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys move, X jumps, Z resets the current room. R resets the game.

Please let me know what you think of the game and what you'd like to see in the future expanded version :)
